text: Keep applying to positions. Keep working on your portfolio and show that you have the skill. If you have worked for all those industries and have exceptional experience, you should be able to show that experience through documents, a portfolio or even a SEO campaign that shows that you made significant/measureable results. Start tracking what you are doing now, and keep building. I started on Upwork with some garbage low-paying clients, but eventually worked enough to have a pretty decent portfolio. Good luck!
